action.description.details[shift]:
Circular Shift any row or column by {{shiftCount}} cell.
You cannot ‘undo’ the previous player’s shift. {{doubleShiftHint}}
action.description.details[collapse]: If there is at least one dead suspect in each column or in each row, you can remove all of them and collapse the board.
action.description.details[disguise]: Pick card from evidence deck. If this card is alive, that will be your new identity, and your current identity will be marked as innocent, otherwise nothing happens.
action.description.details[disarm]: Remove one bomb or threat marker on an adjacent suspect.
action.description.details[accuse]:
Accuse any adjacent alive suspect of being some of mafiosi. If the accusation is confirmed, then he will be arrested.
You can accuse yourself to throw off suspicion.
action.description.details[farAccuse]:
Accuse any alive suspect within 3 orthogonal spaces of being some of mafiosi. If the accusation is confirmed, then he will be arrested.
You can accuse yourself to throw off suspicion.
action.description.details[knifeKill]: Kill any non arrested adjacent suspect.
action.description.details[swapSuspects]: Switch any two adjacent(each other) suspects.
action.description.details[placeThreat]:
Passive(At start of your turn):
Any adjacent suspects with threat marker will be killed.

Active(At end of your turn):
Mark 1, 2, or 3 alive and non arrested suspects within 3 orthogonal spaces of you with threat markers.
action.description.details[placeBomb]:
Place a bomb marker on yourself or any adjacent suspect.

Reaction:
When a mafioso is accused while he has a bomb marker, you may perform a Detonate action on him before he will be arrested.
action.description.details[detonateBomb]: Detonate one of suspects with bomb marker. Then detonate another suspect adjacent to it. If the second suspect also had a bomb marker, you can detonate one more another adjacent suspect and so on. By this method, it is possible to create long detonation chains. Non arrested suspects will be killed.
action.description.details[snipeKill]: Kill any non arrested suspect within 3 spaces diagonally.
action.description.details[setup]: Move a bomb, threat, or protection marker off of a suspect and onto any adjacent suspect without a marker of the same type.
action.description.details[autopsy]: Choose an adjacent deceased suspect. Every mafioso player adjacent to that suspect will become known.
action.description.details[canvas]: Pick 2 cards from evidence deck. Choose one of them. Each mafioso or agent player adjacent to that suspect will become known. Chosen suspect will be marked as innocent.
action.description.details[profile]:
Passive(At start of a game):
You have a 4 cards from evidence deck. It forms your evidence hand.

Active:
Choose one alive card from evidence hand. Every mafioso player adjacent to that suspect will become known. Chosen suspect will be marked as innocent.

Passive(At end of your turn):
Evidence hand will be filled up to 4 cards, removing killed suspect cards.

Press P to open Evidence hand.
action.description.details[placeProtecti:
Passive(At start of your turn):
Place or remove protection marker from any suspect. You may not have more than 6 in play at a time.

Reaction:
When a suspect with a protection marker would be killed, if you are in the same row or column as that suspect, you may protect him, and he do not die. Any effects of the kill action will be stopped(such as bomb detonation chain). You cannot protect yourself.
